org.opends.server.replication.server

Class ECLServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.replication.server.MessageHandler
        • org.opends.server.replication.server.ServerHandler
          • org.opends.server.replication.server.ECLServerHandler

  • public final class ECLServerHandler
extends ServerHandler
    This class defines a server handler, which handles all interaction with a peer replication server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ChangeNumber eligibleCN
      Eligible changeNumber - only changes older or equal to eligibleCN are published in the ECL.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> excludedServiceIDs
      Specifies the excluded DNs (like cn=admin, ...).
      boolean isEndOfDraftCNReached
      Specifies whether the draft change number (seqnum) db has been read until its end.
      short isPersistent
      Specifies whether the current search has been requested to be persistent or not.
      int lastDraftCN
      Specifies the last draft changer number (seqnum) requested.
      MultiDomainServerState previousCookie
      Specifies the value of the cookie before the change currently processed is returned.
      int searchPhase
      Specifies the current search phase : INIT or PERSISTENT.
      java.lang.String startCookie
      Specifies the cookie contained in the request, specifying where to start serving the ECL.

    • Field Detail

      • lastDraftCN

        public int lastDraftCN
        Specifies the last draft changer number (seqnum) requested.

      • isEndOfDraftCNReached

        public boolean isEndOfDraftCNReached
        Specifies whether the draft change number (seqnum) db has been read until its end.

      • isPersistent

        public short isPersistent
        Specifies whether the current search has been requested to be persistent or not.

      • searchPhase

        public int searchPhase
        Specifies the current search phase : INIT or PERSISTENT.

      • startCookie

        public java.lang.String startCookie
        Specifies the cookie contained in the request, specifying where to start serving the ECL.

      • previousCookie

        public MultiDomainServerState previousCookie
        Specifies the value of the cookie before the change currently processed is returned. It is updated with the change number of the change currently processed (thus becoming the "current" cookie just before the change is returned.

      • excludedServiceIDs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> excludedServiceIDs
        Specifies the excluded DNs (like cn=admin, ...).

      • eligibleCN

        public ChangeNumber eligibleCN
        Eligible changeNumber - only changes older or equal to eligibleCN are published in the ECL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ECLServerHandler

        public ECLServerHandler(Session session,
                int queueSize,
                java.lang.String replicationServerURL,
                int replicationServerId,
                ReplicationServer replicationServer,
                int rcvWindowSize)
        Creates a new handler object to a remote replication server.
        Parameters:
        session - The session with the remote RS.
        queueSize - The queue size to manage updates to that RS.
        replicationServerURL - The hosting local RS URL.
        replicationServerId - The hosting local RS serverId.
        replicationServer - The hosting local RS object.
        rcvWindowSize - The receiving window size.

      • ECLServerHandler

        public ECLServerHandler(java.lang.String replicationServerURL,
                int replicationServerId,
                ReplicationServer replicationServer,
                StartECLSessionMsg startECLSessionMsg)
                 throws DirectoryException
        Creates a new handler object to a remote replication server.
        Parameters:
        replicationServerURL - The hosting local RS URL.
        replicationServerId - The hosting local RS serverId.
        replicationServer - The hosting local RS object.
        startECLSessionMsg - the start parameters.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - when an errors occurs.

                               throws DirectoryException
